- - - - 8 - 10 11 you will likely need to knit 2 additional rounds to end with a round 4 to be set-up for the separate for sleeves section continue to separate for sleeves separate for sleeves knit to m *sm sl1 k2 psso sm place 48 52 52 61 69 71 79 82 87 96 100 sts on scrap yarn or stitch hold- er backwards co 16 16 18 18 20 21 20 21 22 23 24 sts sm sl1 k2 psso sm k to m repeat from * to end of round total sts on needles 196 212 228 244 264 278 304 318 340 358 380 continue to knit in stockinette per the following pattern for striping in the round and mock cable along sides until piece measures 9¼ 9¼ 9¼ 9¾ 9¾ 9¾ 10¼ 10¼ 11¼ 11¼ 11¼ / 23 23 23 24 5 24 5 24 5 25 5 25 5 28 28 28 cm from underarm or 1½ / 4 cm shorter than your desired front length with c1 next round k to m sm k1 yo k1 sm x 4 k to end of round next 2 rnds knit slipping markers as you reach them cut c1 join c2 round 1 k to m sm sl1 k2 psso sm x 4 k to end of round round 2 k to m sm k1
